briefdescription.para:
disabled=@GetUndoDisabledAttribute() will toggle the attribute
disabled="@GetUndoDisabledAttribute()" will toggle the value of the attribute

disabled=@GetRedoDisabledAttribute() will toggle the attribute
disabled="@GetRedoDisabledAttribute()" will toggle the value of the attribute
The header has @onclick events in the UI and as such could not be made into a RenderFragment. Instead, the UI was inlined into the TextEditorViewModelDisplay.

detaileddescription.para: TODO: Move this back into TextEditorDefaultHeaderDisplay. This was made into the Driver idea, then made back into a component.
